segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while everything is falling apart around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just tired or completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her—she’s going to have a big mess to clean up later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
